name: Vishnu
para: I'm fortunate that I got association of members of Ethiccraft in my early days of college. Through this journey I have learnt how to stay happy & peaceful all the time. This experience helped  me to be a better person.

name: Mukul
para: club has given me an urge to know the answer of why to do anything.

name: Mohit
para: I am thus grateful to wave Society Club not just because it helped me grow as a well-trained professional but also as a human being!
